Title: Provides benefits to Metro-North employees involved in or who witness a serious injury or fatality of another person in the course of an assigned duty
Summary: Provides benefits to Metro-North employees involved in or who witness a serious injury or fatality of another person in the course of an assigned duty.
LawCode: Add ยง1266-n, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing benefits to Metro-North employees involved in or who witness a serious injury or fatality of another person in the course of an assigned duty
